attributes.action: life imprisonment for crimes against children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: for serious crimes such as sexual assault, rape and murder of children make life mean life, not just 10 years and then out again to reoffend.keep them there for the rest of their life, they have taken a childs life, be it by mentally scarring them or killing them, so they should serve life.
